title: Outstanding Reviewers for Chemical Society Reviews in 2023
content:
Chem. Soc. Rev., 2024, 53,7308-7308

We would like to take this opportunity to highlight the Outstanding Reviewers for Chemical Society Reviews in 2023, as selected by the editorial team for their significant contribution to the journal.
